instructions: In the top right corner of youtube.com , click your profile picture. Click Switch account . Sign in to the account associated with the channel you want to move. Warning It's important that you are signed in to the account associated with the channel you want to move. For example, if you want to move the channel associated with your Google Account to a Brand Account, make sure you are signed in to your Google Account for this step. Similarly, if you want to move the channel associated with your Brand Account to your Google Account, make sure you are signed in to your Brand Account. This will ensure that your channel is not unintentionally deleted during the move Go to your advanced account settings . Under Account information , click either Move channel to Brand Account or Move channel to your Google Account or a different Brand Account . You ll need to enter your password and re-authenticate To re-authenticate, do one of the following: Use a security key (if a security key is linked to the account). Get a prompt sent to your phone (if you have gmail or google maps installed in your iOS, or if you have logged in your Android). Sign in using a backup code (if you can t verify using your secondary credentials). Verify your account via SMS if there s a recovery phone number. If you see an error message with Action Blocked, you need to have a phone and follow the steps below: For Android users, stay signed into the Google account for several days For iOS users, install either the Gmail or Google Search app and stay signed in to one of those apps for several days. For non-Android, non-iOS users, add a recovery phone number to your Google account and wait for several days. Choose the account you want to move to from the list given. If the account you choose is already associated with a YouTube channel, click Delete channel in the box that pops up. Note : This will delete the channel that is already associated with that account. This means that any content associated with this channel (including videos, comments, messages, playlists, and history) will be permanently deleted. Check how your channel name will appear after moving, then click Move channel . Important : This will delete any existing channel (along with all of its videos) that is already associated with the account that you're moving to.

Keep your Apple Watch and iPhone close together until this process is complete. Use the Apple Watch app on the iPhone to access the My Watch tab and tap General > Reset. Tap Erase Apple Watch Content and Settings. Tap again to verify, and enter your Apple ID password if prompted. If you have a cellular plan attached to your Apple Watch you'll need to choose to keep or remove your phone plan. If you're only using this process to unlock your Apple Watch then choose to keep your plan. When the reset is finished you can set up your Apple Watch again and opt to Restore from Backup .

Keep Apple Watch and your iPhone close together. In the Apple Watch app on your iPhone go to the My Watch tab. Tap your watch name at the top of the screen, then the Information icon. Tap Unpair Apple Watch. If you have a cellular plan attached to your watch you will also need to tap Remove [Carrier] Plan. Enter your Apple ID password and tap to confirm.
